name: Ninja Stickman Jump Escape
description:
One of the Most addictive ninja puzzle game on AppStore!

Think you are up for this challenge?

Ninja kid is on the run but now he has reached the end of the line the only this he has is a magic stick which can grow as long as you want.But be aware if the stick is longer than necessary could be a problem.

Download Nina Stickman Escape For Free!!
